article: You and I have principles. And we also have opinions. I have opinions about what I think is  _  or wrong, good or bad. But they're only  _  ---I could be wrong! I won't try to  _  my life around my opinions, but I will try to  _  my principles. A 15-year-old boy learned a(n)  _  lesson about principles. However, his father said, "I don't think you should have  _  $20 for doing what you should do. A person shouldn't be  _  for being honest.". He thought about his father's  _  and decided he would return the money. He returned to the lady's home and  _  her back the twenty dollars. She didn't want to take it, but he told her she  _  to , for his father pointed out  _  to him that he had never  _  before. When principles  _  our decisions and actions, we actually change.
